page.title: 12SHOPS IN GREAT SAMPFORD
page.content: In Gt.Sampford the population is quite high.To cope with the problems of bare cupboardsthere is one shop called Mace.This shop sells the necessary everyday food.The Post Office sells stamps,postcards,newspapers and stationery.The garage also sells a few things.Mobile vans tour around the district.For a big shopping spree you have to go to bigger places such as Saffron Walden,Cambridge,Haverhill or Bishop Stortford.There are some shops in Thaxted,a small town nearby.The only shop in the village has new owners.It only used to open for a short period of time.Now it is open for much longer.This will make shopping much easier in the village.
